meanings.sent1: The recipe called for adding two twelfths of a cup of sugar.
meanings.sent2: She divided the pizza into twelfths to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The baker mistakenly used eleven twelfths of the flour in the cake.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each player represented a twelfth of the kingdom's population.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck twelve, signaling the start of the twelfths hour.

meanings.definition: The twelfth member of a series.
meanings.sent1: The singer was the twelfths performer in the talent show lineup.
meanings.sent2: He was the twelfths student to arrive at the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The twelfths book on the shelf was the most worn out.
meanings.sent4: She was the twelfths person to cross the finish line in the race.
meanings.sent5: The twelfths chapter of the novel revealed a surprising plot twist.
